Settings.QueryText: SELECT Counterparties.Ref AS Ref, Counterparties.IsFolder, Counterparties.Description AS Description, Counterparties.Code AS Code, Counterparties.Parent, Counterparties.BasicInformation, CAST(Counterparties.DescriptionFull AS STRING(250)) AS LegalName, Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual, Counterparties.TIN, Counterparties.RegistrationNumber, Counterparties.BankAccountByDefault, Counterparties.ContractByDefault, Counterparties.Responsible, Counterparties.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, Counterparties.AccessGroup, Counterparties.Comment, Counterparties.CreationDate, Counterparties.Customer, Counterparties.Supplier, Counterparties.OtherRelationship, Counterparties.CustomerAcquisitionChannel, CASE WHEN CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.Counterparty IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS ThereAreDuplicates, CASE WHEN Counterparties.LegalEntityIndividual = VALUE(Enum.CounterpartyKinds.Individual) THEN CASE WHEN Counterparties.DeletionMark THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE CASE WHEN Counterparties.DeletionMark THEN 2 ELSE 0 END END AS IconIndex, Counterparties.Tags.( LineNumber, Tag ) FROM Catalog.Counterparties AS Counterparties LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.CounterpartyDuplicatesExist AS CounterpartyDuplicatesExist ON Counterparties.Ref = CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.Counterparty AND Counterparties.TIN = CounterpartyDuplicatesExist.TIN WHERE Counterparties.IsFolder = FALSE

v8:item.v8:content: Показать / скрыть дополнительный отбор по тегам
